verses.verse: If a man <WH376> shall steal <WH1589> an ox <WH7794>, or a sheep <WH7716>, and kill <WH2873> it <WH4376>, or sell it <WH7999>; he shall pay five <WH2568> oxen <WH1241> for an ox <WH7794>, and four <WH702> sheep <WH6629> for a sheep <WH7716>.
